executable.title: Register Images MultiRes (Experimental)
executable.description: Provides affine registration using multiple resolution levels and decomposed affine transforms.

image.name: fixedImage
image.label: Fixed Image
image.description: Image which defines the space into which the moving image is registered

image.name: movingImage
image.label: Moving Image
image.description: The transform goes from the fixed image's space into the moving image's space

transform.name: outputTransform
transform.label: Output transform
transform.description: Save the output transform from the registration

image.name: fixedImageMask
image.label: Fixed Image Mask image
image.description: Label image which defines a mask of interest for the fixed image

integer.name: numIterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: Number of iterations to run at each resolution level.

float.name: stepSize
float.label: Step Size (voxels)
float.description: The maximum step size of the optimizer in voxels
